You always have to feel http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_26pts_Melo_38pts_vs_Sonics_KDurant_37pts_07/08_NBA Touted rookies Kevin Durant and Jeff Kollman Green both had career-best efforts for the Seattle SuperSonics and damaged the Denver Nuggets' postseason aspirations. Kevin Durant , the second- overall pick in last year's draft and the leading candidate for rookie of the year, scored a season-high 37 points and Green, the fifth pick, had a season-high 35 to lead the Sonics to a 151-147 double-overtime victory over Denver on Sunday night.`` My teammates were making plays and I was just there finishing them, Green said.
